Name: Michael
AboutMe:
Hi!

I’m from Austria, English is not my native tongue so please be lenient with my language skills.

My one and only bicycle is a Focus Mares 2009 cyclocross bike which I use for everything: Road bike training, cyclocross, easy mountainbiking, getting groceries, commuting, travelling, riding in the winter and so on. I enjoy reading about bicycles and do all the maintenance and tuning myself. I also often have to fix bicycles for friends or relatives.

I’m working and studying in the IT and electronics field and will (hopefully) have my bachelor’s degree in Hardware Software Design in fall. I also studied some mechanical engineering.
